Battle Cards
View On FortressMaximus.io

Swerve

  1. Which cards do not 'work' on a character in Body mode?
    The following cards apply to Bot mode and thus will not affect an enemy character in its Body mode:
    - Cornered!
    - Marksmanship
    The following cards apply to Bot mode and thus will not affect one of your characters in its Body mode:
    - Cliffjumper - Renegade Warrior's Alt mode ability
    - Conversion Expertise (still provides Tough 1 in Alt mode)
    - Escape Route
    - Hit and Run
    - Hunker Down (still upgrades with Armor if the character with Body mode is currently a Tank)
    - Pop a Wheelie (if there was a Motorcycle with a Body mode, it would not flip)
    - Roll Out!
    - Start Your Engines (still untaps if the character with Body mode is currently a Car)
    - Swerve
    - Unconventional Flying Object
  2. If I have a Cassette in Bot Mode that is chosen as a defender but flip a Swerve does it fizzle the attack when the character flips to Cassette due to the Stealth on that side as long as another target is legal to attack? Or not, since it's already been chosen as the defender?
    Once an attack is legally declared, the defender picking up Stealth wonâ€™t matter.
  3. If I flip a character who lets me play a card for free such as Detritus - Arms Dealer who allows me to play a Black Pip card, can I play a Smoke Cloak this way to give Detritus Tough 1 for that battle, or does it apply after flips have ready happened?
    Swerve happens before Battle Cards are flipped, so if you reveal Swerve to flip Detritus in this way and play Smoke Cloak, the Tough 1 would be in place before Battle Cards are flipped..
